TopicTitle: When will squad add new planet analogs?!?!

Articles.Content: When Nova left the job, I wanted to know what happened to his ideas. Will they ever come back?![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif):(![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

If they do, it will probably be after any Unity 5 and/or 64-bit stable releases. I imagine memory is an issue to adding entire planets, so I would speculate Squad would want to see how much resource (computer resource) usage is required to run the new Unity 5 or get a 64-bit version stable first, before adding more "stuff" to it.

I am purely speculating on this, I have no real idea if they even intend to add new planets in the future. Even if they don't intend to, they may change their minds later like they did with multiplayer. In any case, I wouldn't expect it in the near term.
